alert.note: Alert for Barry; Christian; Lawrence; Stone (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 11:39AM CDT until May 15 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CHRISTIAN...NORTHERN STONE...NORTHERN BARRY AND SOUTHERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES... At 1139 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Clever to near Crane to near Purdy, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Table Rock Lake... Monett... Aurora... Marionville... Clever... Crane... Pierce City... Purdy... Billings... Verona... Butterfield... Galena... Mccord Bend... Pioneer... Hurley... Wheelerville... Jenkins... Ponce de Leon... Mcdowell... Pleasant Ridge... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
